Summarise complexity of ctfs:

```{r}
library(sig)
sig_report(pkg2env(ctfs))
```

On page 67 of _Testing R code_, Richard Cotton recomends keeping packages simple:

> Try running a sig\_report on the Hmisc package, the gold standard in monstrously big and complicated functions. For contrast, try funning a report on _assertive_ and _testthat_ too.

```{r}
sig_report(pkg2env(Hmisc))
```

_assertive_

```{r}
sig_report(pkg2env(assertive))
```

_testthat_

```{r}
sig_report(pkg2env(testthat))
```
